commissions.title: Commissions 101
commissions.content: Learn how real estate commissions became standard at 5–6%, how that impacts you, and what has changed after recent lawsuits.

steering.title: Steering Explained
steering.content: Understand how steering happens when agents guide buyers toward homes that pay higher commissions — and how HomePilot helps you avoid it.

savingMoney.title: Saving Money on Agent Fees
savingMoney.content: Learn negotiation strategies to keep more equity whether you are buying or selling a home — without unnecessary 3% fees.

negotiatingFees.title: Negotiating Your Fees
negotiatingFees.content: Discover how to structure your offer to maximize seller acceptance while reducing commissions paid out of your loan or cash.
